name: Cake Mix
description:
~ Notes & Features ~

* Contains 3 delicious endings and CGs!
* Around 2k scrumptious words if everything is read. Wow!
* Press F3 while in fullscreen mode!
* If there's an error message, try refreshing your browser. If it doesn't work, please let me know!

~ Controls ~

Keyboard:
Arrow Keys - move
Shift - run
Z - interactX or ESC - access pockets

Mouse/Mobile:
Press Screen - move and interact
Top Right Square or Right-Click - access pockets

 ~ Credits ~

* Beautiful Music - "Distance", "Friends Forever", "Thinking of You", "Forever Dreaming", and "Are You Still Dreaming" by Alcaknight
* Amazing RPG Maker Plugin by Galv
* Art, writing, and other assets by MintGlow, but who knows who that is

This was made in a week to test out RPG Maker, but I hope you still enjoy it :D
(P.S., tell me if you'd like a walkthrough/downloadable version!)
